docs.snippet: Joshua Boyle, who with his family was freed by Pakistani troops, also said his wife had been raped during their five-year captivity by the Haqqani network.

docs.snippet: Parliament has approved the prosecution of the opposition leader, Kem Sokha, stripping away his last shield in a crackdown by Prime Minister Hun Sen.

docs.snippet: For the perpetrators of the attack on America, the biggest success has been the injection of fear into the national psyche.
As I completed this pillar of my faith, I was preoccupied with the conflicting messages all around me. To make sense of them, I shared everything.

docs.snippet: Tony Hovater, a 29-year-old welder, helped form a pro-Nazi group. Now he is hoping his bigotry and fascist ideals will go mainstream.
